TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IMailSpool implements class MailKit.IMailService, class System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1<class MimeKit.MimeMessage>, class System.Collections.IEnumerable, class System.IDisposable

Docs.summary: An interface for retreiving messages from a spool.
Docs.remarks: An interface for retreiving messages from a spool.

MemberSignature.Value: public int Count { get; }
.property instance int32 Count

Docs.summary: Get the number of messages available in the message spool.

remarks.para: Gets the number of messages available in the message spool.
Once authenticated, the property will be set to the number of available messages in the spool.

MemberSignature.Value: public bool SupportsUids { get; }
.property instance bool SupportsUids

Docs.summary: Get whether or not the service supports referencing messages by UIDs.
Docs.value: true if supports uids; otherwise, false.

remarks.para: Not all servers support referencing messages by UID, so this property should be checked before using and .
If the server does not support UIDs, then all methods that take UID arguments along with and will fail.
